author: jrbauer
msg: OPENJPA-1613 Per JPA spec, OpenJPA should take the @Transient annotation into account when making a default access determination.  This commit includes test code contributed by Simon Droscher.

author: schor
msg: [UIMA-1756] change the resource bundle we use for remote-resources to be exactly like the official apache one, except for providing the capability to add postNoticeText.  This allows us to substitute this for the apache one.  Previous design was not working reliably.

author: woonsan
msg: PB-104: Adding a generic script support for preferences validator
